articles.author: Sonny Bunch
articles.title: ‘Joker’ dominated the Oscar nominations because it captures our age perfectly
articles.description: It is undeniable that “Joker” has struck a chord with all sorts of audiences, all of us living through our moment of populist resentment and anger. Why so serious about its Oscar nominations?
articles.content: Dan Koiss response in Slate was representative. From its dumb yellow title card to its antiheros dumb delusions of grandeur to its dumb absolute belief in its own transgressiveness, Joker is just as stupid as can be, Kois eloquently stated, perfectly capturin… [+4478 chars]
